title: Verify Image Authenticity
text: To verify an image's authenticity, consider checking its metadata. This can provide information about the image's origin, date, and any modifications.

title: Analyze Image Composition
text: While analyzing the image composition can help understand the image's context, it doesn't confirm authenticity.

title: Search for Similar Images
text: Searching for similar images online can help identify if the image has been used elsewhere, but it doesn't guarantee authenticity.

title: Evaluate Aesthetic Quality
text: Evaluating an image's aesthetic quality is subjective and doesn't contribute to verifying its authenticity.

title: Key Step in Image Verification
text: What is a crucial step in verifying the authenticity of an image?
